word: The Comforter will be to you all that you desire. You will be weighted with the Spirit of God, and the importance of the message, and the work. I know that the Lord is willing to reveal to you the wondrous things out of His law. Oh, let all take knowledge of you, that you have been with Jesus.-- Letter 30a, 1892, pp. 10, 11. (To Elder S. N. Haskell, Sept. 6, 1892.) Released Dec. 1, 1966.
